snippet: The first novel by the “Law & Order” creator Dick Wolf, “The Intercept” provides a sense of insiderdom in an otherwise standard detective novel about a terrorist plot.
abstract: Megan Abbott reviews book The Intercept: A Jeremy Fisk Novel by Dick Wolf.
lead_paragraph: The first novel by the “Law & Order” creator Dick Wolf, “The Intercept” provides a sense of insiderdom in an otherwise standard detective novel about a terrorist plot.

headline.main: Terrorists No Match for Single City Cop
headline.print_headline: Terrorists No Match For Single City Cop
